title: WATCH: Miss SA Zozibini Tunzi was a contestant on Presenter Search on 3 and we found her audition clip
text:
WATCH: Miss SA Zozibini Tunzi was a contestant on Presenter Search on 3 and we found her audition clip share this

Johannesburg – Did you know that Miss SA Zozibini Tunzi was a contestant on reality TV show Presenter Search on 3 in 2018?

Well, neither did we. Not only did Zozibini audition for the Cape Town leg of the presenter search hosted by SABC 3, she also made it into the competition as one of the lucky few chosen to represent the Mother City.

If you're gasping right now, we get it; we were shocked as well.

The official Miss SA page shared this info with fans, posting a snap of Zozibini on the Presenter Search on 3 set.

WATCH ZOZIBINI'S AUDITION BELOW:

IN THIS CLIP THE BEAUTY QUEEN INTERVIEWED BASETSANA KUMALO:
description: Did you know that Miss SA Zozibini Tunzi was a contestant on reality TV show Presenter Search on 3?
